00036 // limited introspection of data items
00037 typedef unsigned int QicsDataItemType;
00038 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_UserDefined = 0;
00039 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Int     = 1;
00040 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Long    = 2;
00041 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Float   = 3;
00042 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Double  = 4;
00043 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_String  = 5;
00044 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Date    = 6;
00045 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_Time    = 7;
00046 const QicsDataItemType QicsDataItem_DateTime    = 8;

00054 // This is used in QicsDataItem::registerType() and must be declared
00055 // first.
00056 
00057 class QicsDataItem;
00062 typedef QicsDataItem * (*QicsDataItemParser)(const QString &);
00067 typedef QicsDataItem * (*QicsDataItemDecoder)(QDataStream &);

00090 class QicsDataItem: public Qics {
00091     
00092 public:
00093 
00098     virtual QicsDataItem *create(void) const = 0;
00099 
00104     virtual QicsDataItem *clone(void) const = 0;
00105 
00106     virtual ~QicsDataItem() {}
00111     virtual bool setString(const QString &qs) = 0;
00112 
00117     virtual const QString string(void) const = 0;
00118         
00123     virtual QicsDataItemType type(void) const = 0;
00124 
00128     virtual QString typeString(void) const = 0;
00129 
00137     inline virtual QString format(const char *) const
00138     { return string(); }
00139 
00146     virtual int compareTo(const QicsDataItem &x) const;
00147 
00151     virtual void encode(QDataStream &ds) const = 0;
00152 
00156     static QicsDataItem *fromString(const QString &str);
00157 
00161     static QicsDataItem *decode(QDataStream &ds);
00162 
00173     static void registerType(const QString type_name,
00174                  QicsDataItemParser parser,
00175                  QicsDataItemDecoder decoder);
00176 
00177 };

00179 typedef int (*DataItemComparator)(const QicsDataItem *, const QicsDataItem *);

00189 class QicsDataInt: public QicsDataItem {
00190 public:
00191             
00195     QicsDataInt() { myData = 0; }
00196 
00200     QicsDataInt(int i) { myData = i;}
00201 
00205     QicsDataInt(const QicsDataInt &di);
00206 
00207     inline QicsDataItem *create(void) const { return new QicsDataInt(); }
00208     inline QicsDataItem *clone(void) const { return new QicsDataInt(*this); }
00209 
00213     inline virtual QicsDataItemType type(void) const
00214     { return (QicsDataItem_Int); }
00215 
00219     inline static QString typeName(void)
00220     { return QString("int"); }
00221 
00225     inline virtual QString typeString(void) const
00226     { return QicsDataInt::typeName(); }
00227 
00232     inline virtual QicsDataInt& operator=(const int& i)
00233     { myData = i; return *this;}
00234         
00235     inline virtual const QString string(void) const { return QString("%1").arg(myData); }
00236     inline virtual bool setString(const QString &qs) 
00237     {bool ok; myData = qs.toInt(&ok); return ok;}
00238 
00242     inline int data(void) const { return myData; }
00243 
00247     inline void setData(int i) { myData = i;}
00248         
00249     inline virtual QString format(const char *fmt_string) const
00250     { QString str; return str.sprintf(fmt_string, myData); }
00251 
00252     int compareTo(const QicsDataItem &x) const;
00253 
00254     inline void encode(QDataStream &ds) const 
00255     { ds << typeString(); ds << myData; }
00256 
00261     static QicsDataItem *fromString(const QString &str);
00262 
00266     static QicsDataItem *decode(QDataStream &ds)
00267     { int val; ds >> val; return new QicsDataInt(val); }
00268 
00269 protected:
00271     int myData;     
00272 };

00610     { myData = qs; return true;}

00613     { myData = s; return true;}

00619     { myData = qs; return true;}

00627

00629     { QString str; return str.sprintf(fmt_string, (const char *) myData); }

00634     { ds << typeString(); ds << myData; }
